resources.string: Promise yourself to get at least one thing right Today.
Always start with what is most important for the day.
Know that you owe yourself success and not others.
Consistency is the key to growth.
Never let anything slide. Confirm them all.
If you are in the verge of giving up, think what the alternative looks like.
Always come clean to yourself. So as to know where you stand
The best way to start is to start.
If you do not make it you have yourself to blame.
live every moment of your life.
